Just Man's Cross

two handed weapon (lvl 2)

item id [id]: 63
national discount [nationrebate]: #50 MA Marignon - Fiery Justice
weap id [weapon]: 161 (Just Man's Cross)
damage [dmg]: 12 Damage (x3 vs Undead/Demon)
range [range]: 45
precision [prec]: +4
nbr of attacks [nratt]: -2
ammunition [ammo]: 12
 
(Requires Two Hands [twohanded], Armor Piercing [armorpiercing], Piercing Damage [pierce], One Third Strength added [bowstr], Magic weapon [magic])

Requires 5F to forge (F1)

This crossbow is enchanted with pure fire for the purpose of destroying undead beings. An undead creature hit by a bolt from this crossbow will most likely be burned to ashes.
